title: Haradachi Magire To Gokigen Tori
alternative_title: 腹立ちまぎれとご機嫌とり;
status: 腹立ちまぎれとご機嫌とり;
description:
Description :
        Kasai Madoka has been in a sexless relationship with his boyfriend Yuuya, who only sees him as a house-keeper. While walking down the street reflecting on his relationship, he encountered a handsome man Yukata Yano, who wants to make him his, and make him give up his boyfriend.
